name: Sanctuary (Shockaedit)
description:
My submission for the #WeeklyGameJam 119!

The theme was Tamagotchi.

CONTROLS: WASD to move

OPEN INVENTORY :  I

INTERACT : E     (Works for spellbooks, picking up apples)

The goal of the game is to raise your Dragon. You have to make him level up.

As he is more and more hungry and thirsty, he will gain less experience.

So you have to feed him with apples from the tree of life. But be carefull as your Dragon will demande more and more experience to level up.  

He gets bigger every 10 levels.

To help you, you can buy upgrades that will give you specials stats.

But everything has a cost .. in the world of Sanctuary, we pay with Gems.

Don't forget to explore Sanctuary, as a lot of secret are waiting for you.

I built all the assets from scratch (Mesh, Textures, Sounds, Particles). 

The only assets that were sourced are :

The ambiant wind sound, the gem icon, the chorus ambiant sound.

Hope you'll like the game, tell me how big got your dragon ! :D
